content: in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 28 r24 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 28 finish off and weave in ends add a cute tag if you wish finished size from table to top of sleeve is 5 corinna s corner custom crochet you may sell finished items please link to pattern listing pattern is property of corinna varilek may not be sold or distributed ©2022
